meanings.definition: things that are commonly done or seen
meanings.sent1: At the park, the children playing on the swings and slides are the usuals.
meanings.sent2: The usuals at the coffee shop always order the same drinks every morning.
meanings.sent3: The usuals at the gym are like clockwork, always there at the same time every day.
meanings.sent4: The usuals in the neighborhood are like familiar landmarks, always present.
meanings.sent5: The usuals in the library spend hours reading their favorite books.

meanings.definition: the regular customers or visitors to a place
meanings.sent1: The usuals at the diner always sit at the same booth for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The usuals at the museum enjoy the exhibits every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The usuals at the zoo know all the animals by name, they visit so often.
meanings.sent4: The usuals at the theater are like family, always sharing in the performances.
meanings.sent5: The usuals at the park feed the ducks and chat with each other every afternoon.
